person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mussolini , who sits in the Chamber , told La Stampa newspaper last month after quitting AN 's parliamentary party that she was considering joining the neo-fascist Social Movement ( MS-Fiamma ) formed by some of the Duce 's World War Two followers .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| Mussolini |
| La Stampa |
| AN |
| Duce |
| World War Two |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| Mussolini |
| La Stampa |

The following entities do not clearly refer to a "Person":

* AN (which stands for "Assemblea Nazionale", the Italian parliament)
* Duce (which refers to Benito Mussolini, the former Italian dictator)
* World War Two (which is a historical event, not a person)
